properties.name: jwt-auth.enabled
properties.description: Enables or disables the JWT authentication. Defaults to 'true'.

properties.name: jwt-auth.http.unauthenticated-endpoints
properties.description: List of ant matchers to be whitelisted by JWT filter. Defaults to '/auth/**'.

properties.name: jwt-auth.jwt.token-prefix
properties.description: Prefix of JWT value. Defaults to 'Bearer_'.

properties.name: jwt-auth.jwt.cookie.httpOnly
properties.description: Whether to make jwt cookies httpOnly. Defaults to true.

properties.name: jwt-auth.jwt.authorities-claim-name
properties.description: Name of authorities claim within JWT. Defaults to 'authorities'.

properties.name: jwt-auth.jwt.cookie.access-cookie-name
properties.description: Name of access JWT cookie. Defaults to 'access'.

properties.name: jwt-auth.jwt.cookie.refresh-cookie-name
properties.description: Name of refresh JWT cookie. Defaults to 'refresh'.

properties.name: jwt-auth.jwt.cookie.access-cookie-path
properties.description: Path for access JWT cookie. Defaults to '/'.

properties.name: jwt-auth.jwt.cookie.refresh-cookie-path
properties.description: Path for refresh JWT cookie. Defaults to '/auth/refresh'.

properties.name: jwt-auth.jwt.access-token-expiration
properties.description: Expiration time in ms for access JWT. Defaults to 300 (5m).

properties.name: jwt-auth.jwt.refresh-token-expiration
properties.description: Expiration time in ms for refresh JWT. Defaults to 43200 (12h).
